Class DefaultTypeFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.finders.DefaultTypeFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationElement, TypeFinder

    public class DefaultTypeFinder
extends Object
implements TypeFinder
    Type finder that locates types in directories and JAR files.

      • find

        public List<Class<?>> find(TypeFinder.TypeFilter filter,
                  String... packageNames)
                    throws AluminumException
        Description copied from interface: TypeFinder
        Finds types matching a certain filter in a number of packages.
        Specified by:
        find in interface TypeFinder
        Parameters:
        filter - the filter to apply
        packageNames - the names of the packages to include in the search (subpackages will be included)
        Returns:
        a list with all types in the given packages that match the given filter (may be empty)
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when something goes wrong while trying to find matching types
